it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common

Class JSONUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.JSONUtils

  • public class JSONUtils
extends Object
    Provides useful methods to load and validate JSON objects. Please note that JSON schemas are not loaded automatically, so they should be loaded on startup.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

    • Method Detail

      • getObjectMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getObjectMapper()
        Returns a global ObjectMapper instance from Jackson, with default configuration. Every class that uses an objectmapper should retrieve it from here, since ObjectMapper creation is very slow but it is also thread-safe.
        Returns:
        a global ObjectMapper instance

      • getNetworkObjectMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper getNetworkObjectMapper()
        Returns a global ObjectMapper instance specifically configured to read/write on network streams. This instance is configured not to automatically close streams when reading/writing.
        Returns:
        a global ObjectMapper instance

      • loadJSONResource

        public static org.json.JSONObject loadJSONResource(String path)
        Loads JSON object from given resource path.
        Parameters:
        path - resource path
        Returns:
        loaded json object
        Throws:
        MissingResourceException - if the specified resource is missing
        org.json.JSONException - if there are errors in the JSON file itself

      • loadWeaponPackSchema

        public static void loadWeaponPackSchema(String schemaPath)
        Loads given weapon pack schema.
        Parameters:
        schemaPath - absolute path of the schema resource

      • validateWeaponPack

        public static void validateWeaponPack(org.json.JSONObject pack)
        Validates weapon pack against its schema.
        Parameters:
        pack - weapon pack JSON to validate
        Throws:
        org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException - if the pack is not valid
        IllegalStateException - if the validation schema had not been previously loaded

      • arrayToStringSet

        public static Set<String> arrayToStringSet(org.json.JSONArray array)
        Converts the given array of strings to a set of strings.
        Parameters:
        array - array of strings, not null
        Returns:
        set of strings from array
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the array contains something other than strings

      • arrayToEnumList

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> List<E> arrayToEnumList(Class<E> clazz,
                                                          org.json.JSONArray array)
        Converts the given array of strings to a list of enumerator values of given type
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of enum
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type of enum to retrieve, not null
        array - array of strings, not null
        Returns:
        list of enum from array
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - if the array does not contain valid names of enum values

      • resetSchemas

        public static void resetSchemas()
        Deletes all the schemas loaded until now.
